ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Northern Ro Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/9/00 2:42:16 PM US Mountain Standard Time, ... Petition it and have a guide reset her to her spot ... Dervs dont hurt his faction as he
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/9/00 2:42:16 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
marlonclark@... writes:

>
> In the north part of Northern Ro, in the
> desert near the city is a merchant. She
> sells to evil races, and is usually on the
> east side. Recently she has moved to the
> west side, and farther north near the zone
> to E. Freeport. More importantly she
> won't sell to me anymore. Says she is busy.
> Has anybody seen this before? She cons
> apprehensive to me. She's been like this
> for several days, so its not that she just
> chased somebody to the zone.


Petition it and have a guide reset her to her spot

>
> Also, over the weekend, Dorn changed from
> 'amiable' to me, to 'ready to attack'.
> Has anybody noticed this before? Does he
> get nasty from time to time.
>
> I am DE Necromancer. I haven't been killing
> Dervs. This is happening on the Fennin Ro
> server.


Dervs dont hurt his faction as he gives bad hits to the typical DE factions,
or he used to. Pluses for Steel and Emerald Warriors. If your faction is ok
at home I might report this one too, but something sounds fishy there.
